text: Tiberiy Popovich (originally , 20 September 1930 – 10 February 2008) was an association footballer from the former Soviet Union who played for FC Dynamo Kyiv. In 1956 Popovich played couple of games for Ukraine at the Spartakiad of the Peoples of the USSR.Football at the 1956 Spartakiad of the Peoples of USSR ==References== Category:1930 births Category:2008 deaths Category:People from Mukachevo Category:Hungarian people of Ukrainian descent Category:Hungarian people of Polish descent Category:Soviet footballers Category:FC Mukacheve players Category:FC Dynamo Kyiv players Category:NK Veres Rivne players Category:Soviet football managers Category:NK Veres Rivne managers Category:FC Avanhard Ternopil managers Category:FC Mariupol managers Category:FC Dnipro Cherkasy managers Category:Merited Coaches of Ukraine Category:Association football defenders
title: Tiberiy Popovich
